product_overview: ISACAR is a comprehensive SaaS platform designed to unify task management, financial tracking, and project administration into a single, modern, and intuitive web application. It serves freelancers, small businesses, startups, and teams with collaborative and scalable features, accessible across devices as a PWA.
core_goals: Centralize task, financial, and project management features into a single platform
Provide a simple and intuitive user interface requiring minimal training
Enable real-time team collaboration with workspace and role-based permissions
Offer flexible tools adaptable to different business types and user profiles
Ensure accessibility on all device types including offline and installable PWA capabilities
Support internationalization with multi-language options for Portuguese, English, and Spanish
Provide scalable infrastructure to grow with user business needs
key_features: Comprehensive task management with quick creation, priorities, subtasks, comments, time tracking, and Notion-style block editor
Robust financial management including transaction tracking, budgeting, recurring bills, category management, and detailed interactive charts
Visual project management with Kanban boards, customizable status, team collaboration, document attachments, and progress visualization
Budget manager with interactive pie charts, financial goals tracking, alerts, and category customization
Dashboard with draggable cards showing overview of tasks, projects, financials, budgets, and activities
Integration with Google services (OAuth, Drive, Calendar, Gmail, Sheets) for authentication, invoice scanning, syncing, and data exports
Multi-workspace support with switching, invite flow, role-based access, and granular permissions
Multi-language support with language selector and localized content
Progressive Web App features including offline mode, install prompts, push notifications, and automatic updates
Global search with keyboard shortcuts and categorized results
User settings for profile, notifications, billing, preferences, and integrations
Security with strong authentication, authorization with row-level security, password policies, and data encryption
user_flow_summary: User authentication via email/password or Google OAuth, with options to register, reset password, and manage sessions
Onboarding new users through a 10-step progressive and customizable flow including workspace creation, team invite, plan selection, and task/budget setup
Navigating the single-page app through a sidebar to main modules: Dashboard, Tasks, Projects, Finance, Budget Manager, Integrations, and Analytics
Creating, managing, and tracking tasks with subtasks, comments, time tracking, and block editing
Managing financial records, budgets, transactions, and generating reports/exporting data
Organizing projects visually on Kanban boards with drag and drop and team collaboration features
Switching between personal and collaborative workspaces with invite acceptance and role assignments
Configuring user settings for profile details, notifications preferences, billing plans, language, and connected integrations
Using Google services integration features including invoice scanning, calendar syncing, and exporting sheets
Utilizing offline mode with local caching and automatic sync upon reconnection
validation_criteria: User authentication workflows must support email/password and Google OAuth with secure password policies
All major modules (Tasks, Finance, Projects, Budget Manager, Analytics) must load and save data reliably with real-time updates via Supabase Realtime
Workspaces must enforce role-based permissions and allow member invites with valid expiration and access controls
PWA features must correctly enable offline data access, caching, and installation prompts
Multi-language support should reflect immediately and persist user language choice across sessions
Dashboard cards must be draggable, customizable and reflect up-to-date data on tasks, finances, and projects
Google integrations require proper authorization flows and functional data sync/export features
Onboarding users should be able to complete or skip steps and data should persist between sessions
Security features must enforce encryption, RLS policies and comply with LGPD regulations
The web app must be responsive and usable on various screen sizes from mobile phones to large monitors
